about_the_game: Welcome to the first entry in the "A Night With:" series— "A Night With: Bartender." Dive into an explicit romantic visual novel that combines detailed character development with adult content. Spend a night with Ivy, a charismatic and skilled bartender, and navigate through an evolving relationship. Set in a vibrant cityscape, each decision influences the course of the encounter, unlocking different paths and fetishes.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game includes mature content that’s designed for adults. This means you'll encounter themes like nudity, adult language, and explicit sexual content. All characters are over 18, and any intimate scenes happen only with mutual consent as part of the storyline. It’s important to engage respectfully and thoughtfully, as inappropriate or offensive behavior leads to a game over. The content isn’t just thrown in; it’s carefully woven into the character development and story progression.

detailed_description: Welcome to the first entry in the "A Night With:" series— "A Night With: Bartender." Dive into an explicit romantic visual novel that combines detailed character development with adult content. Spend a night with Ivy, a charismatic and skilled bartender, and navigate through an evolving relationship. Set in a vibrant cityscape, each decision influences the course of the encounter, unlocking different paths and fetishes.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full HD monitor is recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

name: A Night With: Bartender

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 750 or better, AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution monitor is recommended
